--50 Nerds of grey

jokes-home-next.content:
'Come over,' she begged. 'I need you right now!' 'Just turn it off and on again,' he sighed. He hated these late night rebooty calls.

--50 Nerds of Grey

jokes-home-prev.content:
Then outside he heard Such a terrible clatter He went straight onto Twitter To see what was the matter ...

--50 Nerds of Grey

movies-home-next.content:
The Finest Hours

On Feb. 18, 1952, a massive storm splits the SS Pendleton in two, trapping more than 30 sailors inside the tanker's sinking stern. Engineer Ray Sybert bravely takes charge to organize a strategy for his fellow survivors.

movies-home-prev.content:
Kung Fu Panda 3

After reuniting with his long-lost father (Bryan Cranston), Po (Jack Black) must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat the villainous Kai (J.K. Simmons).
